   19: %%
   20: -module(tls_server_session_ticket_SUITE).
   21: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_alert.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_cipher.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_internal.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_handshake_1_3.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Callback functions
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          init_per_group/2,
   36:          end_per_group/2,
   37:          init_per_testcase/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   39: %% Testcases
   40: -export([expired_ticket_test/0,
   41:          expired_ticket_test/1,
   42:          invalid_ticket_test/0,
   43:          invalid_ticket_test/1,
   44:          main_test/0,
   45:          main_test/1,
   46:          misc_test/0,
   47:          misc_test/1,
   48:          valid_ticket_older_than_windowsize_test/0,
   49:          valid_ticket_older_than_windowsize_test/1,
   50:          certificate_encoding_test/0,
   51:          certificate_encoding_test/1]).
   52: 
   53: -define(LIFETIME, 3). % tickets expire after 3s
   54: -define(TICKET_STORE_SIZE, 1).
   55: -define(MASTER_SECRET, "master_secret").
   56: -define(PRF, sha).
   57: -define(VERSION, ?TLS_1_3).
   58: -define(PSK, <<15,168,18,43,216,33,227,142,114,190,70,183,137,57,64,64,66,152,115,94>>).
   59: -define(WINDOW_SIZE, 1).
   60: -define(SEED, <<1,2,3,4,5>>).
   61: 
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: all() ->
   66:     [{group, stateful},
   67:      {group, stateful_with_cert},
   68:      {group, stateless},
   69:      {group, stateless_with_cert},
   70:      {group, stateless_antireplay}
   71:     ].
   72: 
   73: groups() ->
   74:     [{stateful, [], [main_test, expired_ticket_test, invalid_ticket_test]},
   75:      {stateful_with_cert, [], [main_test, expired_ticket_test, invalid_ticket_test]},
   76:      {stateless, [], [expired_ticket_test, invalid_ticket_test, main_test, certificate_encoding_test]},
   77:      {stateless_with_cert, [], [expired_ticket_test, invalid_ticket_test, main_test, certificate_encoding_test]},
   78:      {stateless_antireplay, [], [main_test, misc_test, valid_ticket_older_than_windowsize_test, certificate_encoding_test]}
   79:     ].
   80: 
   81: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   82:     catch application:stop(crypto),
   83:     try application:start(crypto) of
   84: 	ok ->
   85:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   86:             Config0
   87:     catch _:_ ->
   88: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   89:     end.
   90: 
   91: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   92:     ssl:stop(),
   93:     application:stop(crypto).
   94: 
   95: init_per_group(stateless_antireplay, Config) ->
   96:     check_environment([{server_session_tickets, stateless},
   97:                        {anti_replay, {?WINDOW_SIZE, 20, 30}}]
   98:                       ++ Config);
   99: init_per_group(Group, Config)
  100:     when Group == stateless orelse Group == stateless_with_cert ->
  101:     check_environment([{server_session_tickets, Group} | Config]);
  102: init_per_group(Group, Config)
  103:     when Group == stateful orelse Group == stateful_with_cert ->
  104:     [{server_session_tickets, Group} | Config].
  105: 
  106: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  107:     Config.
  108: 
  109: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config)  ->
  110:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}]),
  111:     AntiReplay = ?config(anti_replay, Config),
  112:     {ok, Pid} = tls_server_session_ticket:start_link(
  113:                   ListenSocket, ?config(server_session_tickets, Config),
  114:                   ?LIFETIME, ?TICKET_STORE_SIZE, _MaxEarlyDataSize = 100,
  115:                   AntiReplay, ?SEED),
  116:     % For all anti-replay test-cases we will sleep longer than the warmup period
  117:     case AntiReplay of
  118:         undefined -> undefined;
  119:         _ ->
  120:             ct:sleep({seconds, 2 * ?LIFETIME})
  121:     end,
  122:     [{server_pid, Pid}, {listen_socket, ListenSocket} | Config].
  123: 
  124: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  125:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  126:     exit(Pid, normal),
  127:     ListenSocket = ?config(listen_socket, Config),
  128:     ok = gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket),
  129:     Config.
  130: 
  131: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  132: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  133: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  134: main_test() ->
  135:     [{doc, "Ticket main scenario"}].
  136: main_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  137:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  138:     % Fill in GB tree store for stateful setup
  139:     tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  140:     % Reach ticket store size limit - force GB tree pruning
  141:     SessionTicket = #new_session_ticket{} =
  142:         tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  143:     TicketRecvTime = erlang:system_time(millisecond),
  144:     %% Sleep more than the ticket lifetime (which is in seconds) in
  145:     %% milliseconds, to confirm that the client reported age (which is in
  146:     %% milliseconds) is compared correctly with the lifetime
  147:     ct:sleep(5 * ?LIFETIME),
  148:     {HandshakeHist, OferredPsks} = get_handshake_hist(SessionTicket, TicketRecvTime, ?PSK),
  149:     AcceptResponse = {ok, {0, ?PSK, undefined}},
  150:     AcceptResponse = tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OferredPsks, ?PRF,
  151:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  152:     % check replay attempt result
  153:     ExpReplyResult = get_replay_expected_result(Config, AcceptResponse),
  154:     ExpReplyResult = tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OferredPsks, ?PRF,
  155:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  156:     true = is_process_alive(Pid).
  157: 
  158: invalid_ticket_test() ->
  159:     [{doc, "Verify invalid tickets handling"}].
  160: invalid_ticket_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  162:     #new_session_ticket{ticket=Ticket} =
  163:         tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  164:     Ids = [#psk_identity{identity = <<"wrongidentity">>,
  165:                          obfuscated_ticket_age = 0},
  166:            #psk_identity{identity = Ticket,
  167:                          obfuscated_ticket_age = 0}],
  168:     OfferedPSKs = #offered_psks{identities = Ids,
  169:                                 binders = [<<"wrongbinder">>, <<"wrongbinder">>]},
  170:     HandshakeHist = tls_handshake:encode_handshake(
  171:                       get_client_hello(OfferedPSKs), ?VERSION),
  172:     ExpectedReason = get_alert_reason(Config),
  173:     {error, #alert{level = ?FATAL,
  174:                    description = ?ILLEGAL_PARAMETER,
  175:                    role = undefined,
  176:                    reason = ExpectedReason}} =
  177:         tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OfferedPSKs, ?PRF,
  178:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  179:     true = is_process_alive(Pid).
  180: 
  181: expired_ticket_test() ->
  182:     [{doc, "Expired ticket scenario"}].
  183: expired_ticket_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  185:     SessionTicket = tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  186:     TicketRecvTime = erlang:system_time(millisecond),
  187:     ct:sleep({seconds, 2 * ?LIFETIME}),
  188:     {HandshakeHist, OFPSKs} = get_handshake_hist(SessionTicket, TicketRecvTime, ?PSK),
  189:     {ok, undefined} = tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OFPSKs, ?PRF,
  190:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  191:     true = is_process_alive(Pid).
  192: 
  193: valid_ticket_older_than_windowsize_test() ->
  194:     [{doc, "Verify valid ticket handling of tickets older than WindowSize"}].
  195: 
  196: valid_ticket_older_than_windowsize_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  197:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  198:     % Fill in GB tree store for stateful setup (Stateless tests also fail without this)
  199:     tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  200:     % Reach ticket store size limit - force GB tree pruning
  201:     SessionTicket = #new_session_ticket{} =
  202:         tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  203:     TicketRecvTime = erlang:system_time(millisecond),
  204:     %% Sleep more than the window length (which is in seconds)
  205:     ct:sleep({seconds, 2 * ?WINDOW_SIZE}),
  206:     {HandshakeHist, OferredPsks} = get_handshake_hist(SessionTicket, TicketRecvTime, ?PSK),
  207:     AcceptResponse = {ok, {0, ?PSK, undefined}},
  208:     AcceptResponse = tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OferredPsks, ?PRF,
  209:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  210:     % check replay attempt result
  211:     ExpReplyResult = get_replay_expected_result(Config, AcceptResponse),
  212:     ExpReplyResult = tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OferredPsks, ?PRF,
  213:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  214:     true = is_process_alive(Pid).
  215: 
  216: misc_test() ->
  217:     [{doc, "Miscellaneous functionality"}].
  218: misc_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  219:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  220:     ok = gen_server:cast(Pid, some_request),
  221:     Pid ! rotate_bloom_filters,
  222:     Pid ! general_handle_info,
  223:     {ok, state} = tls_server_session_ticket:code_change(old_version, state, extra),
  224:     Pid = tls_server_session_ticket:format_status(not_relevant, Pid),
  225:     true = is_process_alive(Pid).
  226: 
  227: certificate_encoding_test() ->
  228:     [{doc, "Verify certifcate encoding/decoding in ticket"}].
  229: 
  230: certificate_encoding_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  231:     Pid = ?config(server_pid, Config),
  232:     tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, undefined),
  233:     Certificate = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(100),
  234:     SessionTicket = #new_session_ticket{} =
  235:         tls_server_session_ticket:new(Pid, ?PRF, ?MASTER_SECRET, Certificate),
  236:     TicketRecvTime = erlang:system_time(millisecond),
  237:     {HandshakeHist, OferredPsks} = get_handshake_hist(SessionTicket, TicketRecvTime, ?PSK),
  238:     AcceptResponse = {ok, {0, ?PSK, Certificate}},
  239:     AcceptResponse = tls_server_session_ticket:use(Pid, OferredPsks, ?PRF,
  240:                                       [iolist_to_binary(HandshakeHist)]),
  241:     true = is_process_alive(Pid).
  242: 
  243: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  244: %% Helpers -----------------------------------------------------------
  245: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  246: get_handshake_hist(#new_session_ticket{} = T, TicketRecvTime, PSK0) ->
  247:     M = #{cipher_suite => {nothing, ?PRF},
  248:           sni => nothing,
  249:           psk => PSK0,
  250:           timestamp => TicketRecvTime,
  251:           ticket => T},
  252:     TicketData = tls_handshake_1_3:get_ticket_data(self(), manual, [M]),
  253:     [#ticket_data{identity = Identity}] = TicketData,
  254:     SomeBinder = <<159, 187, 86, 6, 55, 20, 149, 208, 3, 221, 78, 126, 254, 101,
  255:                    123, 251, 151, 189, 17, 53>>,
  256:     OfferedPSKs0 = #offered_psks{identities = [Identity], binders = [SomeBinder]},
  257:     Hello0 = get_client_hello(OfferedPSKs0),
  258:     Hello1 = tls_handshake_1_3:maybe_add_binders(Hello0, TicketData, ?VERSION),
  259:     PSK1 =  maps:get(pre_shared_key, Hello1#client_hello.extensions),
  260:     OfferedPSKs1 = PSK1#pre_shared_key_client_hello.offered_psks,
  261:     {tls_handshake:encode_handshake(Hello1, ?VERSION), OfferedPSKs1}.
  262: 
  263: get_client_hello(OfferedPSKs) ->
  264:     PreSharedKey = #pre_shared_key_client_hello{offered_psks = OfferedPSKs},
  265:     Ext0 = ssl_handshake:empty_extensions(?VERSION, client_hello),
  266:     #client_hello{
  267:        client_version = ?VERSION,
  268:        random = <<1:256>>,
  269:        session_id = <<>>,
  270:        cipher_suites = [?TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384],
  271:        extensions = Ext0#{pre_shared_key => PreSharedKey}}.
  272: 
  273: get_replay_expected_result(Config, AcceptResponse) ->
  274:     case get_group(Config) of
  275:         stateless ->
  276:             % no protection - replayed ticket is accepted
  277:             AcceptResponse;
  278:         stateless_with_cert ->
  279:             % no protection - replayed ticket is accepted
  280:             AcceptResponse;
  281:         _ ->
  282:             {ok, undefined}
  283:     end.
  284: 
  285: get_alert_reason(Config) ->
  286:     case get_group(Config) of
  287:         stateful ->
  288:             stateful;
  289:         stateful_with_cert ->
  290:             stateful;
  291:         _ ->
  292:             stateless
  293:     end.
  294: 
  295: get_group(Config) ->
  296:     proplists:get_value(name, ?config(tc_group_properties, Config)).
  297: 
  298: check_environment(T) ->
  299:     case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  300:         true ->
  301:             T;
  302:         _ ->
  303:             {skip, insufficient_environment}
  304:     end.
